item.title: Supreme Court justices appear skeptical that Trump tariffs are legal
item.description: President Donald Trump calls the Supreme Court case on his tariffs a matter of "life or death" for the United States.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani wins New York City mayor’s race, NBC News projects
item.description: The rise of Zohran Mamdani, a democratic socialist, fueled a wave of spending to oppose his candidacy and back the former New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo.
